text: Hendrika Cornelia Maria "Ria" Vedder-Wubben (20 May 1951 â€“ 23 August 2016) was a Dutch politician. As a member of the Christian Democratic Appeal, she served in the Senate from 2003 to 2011. In the Senate, she was concerned with pensions and tax law. Vedder-Wubben died on 23 August 2016 in The Hague at the age of 65.Oud-senator Ria Vedder-Wubben overleden == References == == Other websites == * Parlement.com biography Category:1951 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from The Hague
title: Ria Vedder-Wubben
